short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sponsor Skipper is an AI-powered Chrome extension that recognizes and auto skips sponsored content inside YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your YouTube viewing by automatically skipping in-video sponsored content. With effortless sponsor detection and a seamless setup, it offers an uninterrupted experience, ensuring you spend time only on content you care about. 

Never again listen to "...and now for the sponsor of this video...".

Try it with a 7-day free trial, no credit card required, and transform your YouTube watching today!
